abstracts.cdata!:
The Technical Assistance Project will
            support the Government's adjustment program  and the
            strengthening of key ministries in critical areas during the
            adjustment period. It will include the following three
            components: (a) support to planning and training; (b)
            support to civil service reform and managment; and (c)
            support to promotion of small and medium enterprises (SME).
            The project will also provide financing for a rapid response
            to other needs identified during the project of adjustment
            program implementation. Finally, it will provide financing
            for the equipment of a Project Management Unit (PMU) and
            other project management needs.
